The First European Games are a historic event for Azerbaijan and Europe. These games have been held at the highest level in the world.
Today's young people who have grown up and brought up in the years of independence are a source of pride for the people of Azerbaijan.
Humanitarian and economic potential, a good mood in the society, national solidarity are the main conditions of Azerbaijan's success.
Azerbaijan was presented to the world as a modern, dynamic, democratic, developing country, connected with its culture and history.
Azerbaijani sportsmen take second place at European Games, it is the victory of Azerbaijani sports and state.
Today, Azerbaijan is successfully moving forward as an independent, developing, strong state.
Over the past 24 years, a strong state has been established at the expense of the talent, hard work of the Azerbaijani people.

Sunday's #dimopsifisma does not concern our country's stay or not in the eurozone.
Already after our decision for a referendum, better debit proposals and the necessary restructuring were dropped at the table #dimopsifisma
The Greek government will be on the table and on Monday, immediately after #dimopsifisma with better conditions for the Greek people.
The popular verdict is much stronger than the will of a government. #Greece #dimopsifisma #OXI
It is unacceptable in a Europe of solidarity to close down the banks, precisely because the government decides to give the people a speech.
And to drive thousands of elderly people into trouble, the government despite financial asphyxiation, cared for and secured their pension
To protect your own pensions we have been battling for so many months. For your right to a decent pension. # Dimopsifisma
They blame you and they are urging you to vote YES on all the measures that the lenders ask for and without any effect of exiting the crisis
# NO is not just a slogan. NO is a decisive step for a better deal. #Greece #dimopsifisma
# NO does not mean breaking with Europe, but returning to a Europe of values. # NO means: strong pressure
A socially equitable agreement that will distribute the burdens to '' haves '' rather than to employees and retirees #dimopsifisma #OXI
They say that I have a hidden plan, if #OXI is voted, to take the country out of the EU. They know the lies.
Those who say it are the same as they used to say in the past. Those who say they offer very poor service to both the people and Europe.
Those who want Europe an epidemic compound with an IMF adhesive are not visionaries for Europe. #Greece #dimopsifisma #OXI
Hellenes, Greeks, I want to thank you from the heart for your sobriety & the coolness that you reward #Greece
Wages and pensions will not be lost. The deposits of citizens who chose not to escape their money will not be lost
Open a brilliant democracy page. And a sure hope for a better deal. #Greece #dimopsifisma #OXI
It is the responsibility to our parents, towards our children, towards ourselves. It's our debt to the #dimopsifisma story #OXI

The Greek people know very well what they are voting on #dimopsifisma. Democracy & justice in Europe. #Greece
#OXI in an unsustainable agreement does not mean not in Europe. It means a demand for a realistic solution. #Greece
Austerity recycles the crisis. Employees and pensioners can not bear extra burdens. #Greece
5 months we are seeking a fair and viable solution but have refused to accept retaliatory measures. #Greece
Or accept the ultimatums or seek an outlet in the Republic. The Greek people can not bother anymore. #Greece
In France, there is only one community: the national community! #NSChateaurenard
Our proposals covered the budgetary targets but were not accepted. They insisted on imposing anti-social measures on us. #Greece
Islam of France must not be an Islam in France. We want to remain a secular republic. # secularity #NSChateaurenard
We have not taken measures against farmers, specific social categories, of the island economy. #Greece
We need you to win the # Regionales2015 and for the next 2 years. #NSChateaurenard
Without debt restructuring, no program is sustainable. #Greece
I only want one candidate from the right and center: I want the # primary2016! #NSChateaurenard
If we retreated to the ultimatum, we would have betrayed the command of the Greek people. #Greece
As soon as we announced #dimopsifisma, the IMF announced that Greek debt needs a 30% haircut and a long grace period. #Greece
The only way to achieve more and get out of the vicious circle of the crisis is to question the Greek people. #dimopsifisma
Before people reach the ballot box, there are signs of retreat from our lenders. #Greece #dimopsifisma
The queues in banks are shameful for Greece and Europe. Our partners have denied an extortionary extension of the program a few days.
We are right. We defend democracy in Greece & Europe. #dimopsifisma #Greece

"This morning, we learned that our businesses created another 223,000 jobs last month." —President Obama
"All told, we've now seen 64 straight months of private-sector job growth, which is a new record." —President Obama
"12.8 million new jobs, and that's good—but we've got more work to do." —President Obama
"We've got to make folks feel like their hard work is getting them somewhere." —President Obama #FixOvertime
"And by the way, our teachers are underpaid." —President Obama
"We've added nearly 900,000 new manufacturing jobs." —President Obama
"Today our high school graduation rate is at an all-time high." —President Obama
"We put in place the toughest Wall Street reform in history that's protecting main street from another crisis." —President Obama
"The uninsured rate in America is now the lowest on record." —President Obama #ACAWorks
"Not only are more people getting health care, businesses are able to start giving raises to their workers." —President Obama
"Middle-class economics works." —President Obama
"We've been talking about the middle class since before it was cool." —President Obama
"The bottom line is: Top-down economics doesn't work. Middle-class economics works." —President Obama
"We need to boost the minimum wage. Give America a raise." —President Obama #RaiseTheWage
"Folks forget sometimes—unions are what helped bring about the 40-hour work week." —President Obama
"We're stronger together than we are by ourselves." —President Obama
"Over the past couple of years, 17 states, almost 30 counties and cities have taken action to raise the minimum wage." —President Obama
"This is an issue of basic fairness: If you work longer and you work harder, you should get paid for it." —President Obama #FixOvertime
"In America, a hard day's work deserves a fair day's pay." —President Obama
"No middle-class family should be priced out of the education that they need." —President Obama
"When the playing field is level, American workers always win." —President Obama
"The last seven years—shoot, the last seven days—should remind us there's nothing America cannot do." —President Obama
"If we're walking down that road together, we're going to get there faster." —President Obama
"Happy Fourth of July, everybody. God bless you. God bless America." —President Obama
